alert.note: Alert for Baldwin; Mobile (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued January 12 at 12:25PM CST until January 12 at 1:00PM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 100 PM CST FOR NORTHEASTERN MOBILE AND NORTHWESTERN BALDWIN COUNTIES... At 1225 PM CST, a confirmed tornado was located near Movico, or 9 miles east of Citronelle, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Damaging tornado and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar confirmed tornado. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. This tornado will be near... Mount Vernon and Movico around 1230 PM CST. TORNADO...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN
info.instruction: To repeat, a tornado is on the ground. TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
